\hline
\textbf{Shortcut in Description} &
\textbf{{\LaTeX} Command} &
\textbf{{\LaTeX} Output} \\ \hline
\Verb|[option-string]|   & \Verb|\op{option-string}|   & \op{option-string}   \\
\Verb|<variable-string>| & \Verb|\pp{variable-string}| & \pp{variable-string} \\
\Verb+|value-string|+    & \Verb|\vp{value-string}|    & \vp{value-string}    \\
\Verb|%{|                & \Verb|[|                    & [                    \\
\Verb|%}|                & \Verb|]|                    & ]                    \\
\Verb|_|                 & \Verb|\_|                   & \_                   \\
\Verb|$p%-0$|            & \Verb|$p_0$|                & $p_0$                \\
\hline
\end{tabular}
